{"blocks":[{"key":"65phr","text":"The limit of detection (LOD_95) is the genome copy number/uL and associated Ct value at which a qPCR amplification would be observed 95% of the time. This can be calculated from the results of the dilution series using PROBIT analysis. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"92kdi","text":"We have provided an Excel file to calculate the LOD_95 for you from your data (resource:   ). Make sure you allow macros to be run. {"blocks":[{"key":"f191i","text":"To calculate the GC/uL from the qPCR Ct values of actual samples you can use the equation: ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8hhgl","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"257hr","text":"log GC/uL = (Ct – intercept) / slope","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"e6kao","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"aplol","text":"where slope and intercept are from the linear regression of the Ct value on log GC/uL generated from the standard curves (e.g. as given in the Excel spreadsheet or from the linear model (lm) fit in R).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"19f8k","text":"For example, performing four replicates of 12 dilutions three times on three separate days. This would be two plates each day to include all targets.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

description: {"blocks":[{"key":"co56g","text":"This protocol outlines the steps for detecting multiple viral gene targets for the pathogens SARS-CoV-2, CrAssphage and HEV using a qPCR assay. Total Nucleic Acid (TNA) extracted from environmental samples (wastewater) is used for testing. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"7vfrr","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8glon","text":"Key Steps and Considerations:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":29}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"3pnke","text":"qPCR Amplification Cycles:","type":"ordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":0,"length":26}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"48p","text":"Follow the outlined cycling conditions for optimal amplification of target viral RNA.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":1,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8p58k","text":" 2. Target Detection:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":4,"length":17}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"cbbqb","text":"Detect SARS-CoV-2 and HEV using specific primers and probes designed for these targets.","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"5n6q2","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
guidelines: {"blocks":[{"key":"a51kj","text":"This protocol describes qPCR based detection of SARS-CoV-2 and HEV gene targets. Additionally, CrAssphage, an indicator of human fecal contamination, and MS2, serving as an external control, are included in the qPCR assays. Due to the similarity in cycling conditions, these assays can be conducted simultaneously for a sample as two distinct panels.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"1ki7p","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9gmd3","text":"The positive controls (PCs) used here are linear oligos (gBlocks) that have been used in generating standard curves. Ideally the concentration of PCs used should yield Ct values that fall in the linear phase of the amplification curve.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6qk98","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
